page.title: 04Impressions of Scunthorpe
page.content: { Ashby,}in Scunthorpe, is a small place but it is very interesting. Some of the{houses}are very old but look nice and some are old but have stone cladding and double glazing making them look modern. The shops are good but there isn't a lot of entertainment for young people, there is only one{amusement arcade called Showboat and a couple of cafes. There are only two{supermarkets because people go to Asda or Leo's because things are cheaper there and are all together, so it's quicker. There are three{clubs}and two{pubs}in Ashby; more children can go into clubs because their parents can't take them into pubs. There are five {hairdressers}in Ashby because people don't go into town to have their hair done, they usually go locally.
